DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective collect high quality MRI data ( un-processed process ) participate subject Medtronic research purpose .
DOC.criteria: Subject least 18 year age Subject willing able undergo study requirement Subject medical condition precludes subject participation Subject magnetizable foreign object ( e.g . jewelry ) remove duration study Subject claustrophobic Subject require sedation MRI scan Subject implant nonMagnetic Resonance conditional medical device : NonMRI conditional pacemaker , Implantable Cardiac Defibrillator ( ICD ) , Cardiac Resynchronization Therapy ( CRT ) , implantable hemodynamic monitor Metal clip ( i.e . brain aneurysm clip ) Artificial heart valve Implanted neural stimulator Gastric capsule camera Swan Ganz catheter Stent Inferior Vena Cava ( IVC ) filter Orthopedic implant Eye prosthesis Vascular access port Penile prosthesis Intrauterine device Subject cochlear implant , middle ear prosthesis , ear surgery Subject ocular foreign body ( i.e . metal shaving ) Subject type device hold place magnet ( i.e . denture ) Subject insulin pump Subject metal shrapnel Subject pregnant lactating Subject magnetizable implant Subject require legally authorize representative sign Patient Informed Consent ( PIC ) / Informed Consent ( IC ) form Subject contraindication MRI scan define study site
